import React, { useState } from 'react'; import taskApi from '../connexion/tasks'; export type TaskState = { title: string; description:string; echeance:string|null, status:Status } enum Slug { TITLE = 'title', DESCRIPTION = 'description',DATE = 'echeance', STATUS='status' } enum Status { VALIDATED = 'validated', TESTED = 'tested', NO_STATUS = '' } const AddTask = (props:any) =>{ const [state,setState] = useState({ title:'', description:'', echeance: null, status: Status.NO_STATUS, }) const handleOnchage = (value:string, slug: Slug) => { setState((current:any) => ({...current,[slug] :value})) } const handleCreate =() => { taskApi.create(state) .then(() =>setState({ title:'', description:'', echeance: null, status: Status.NO_STATUS, })).catch((erro:any) => console.error(erro)); } const currentDate = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; return ( <>

New Task

handleOnchage(e.target.value,Slug.TITLE)} />
